Name: Full Circle
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Fruity and easy-drinking, yet with complexity from the gin. At least that's how this cocktail tastes when made with pomegranate juice freshly squeezed using a pillar press juicer. (1 pomegranate yields approx. 135ml juice.)
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2004 at Mandarin Oriental, New York City, USA. The name is a reference to the bar's location - Columbus Circle, where one of the world's first one-way rotary systems (roundabout) was implemented in 1904.
Nutrition: One serving of Full Circle contains 170 calories
